# generate mermaid graph from set of zet cards

- concept of `generate mermaid graph from set of zet cards`
- can use script `zet/20221014025416/tagboundary` to get tag boundaries of cards
  - example: print all connected nodes marked by notes tag
  `highlevel=20221011182140 # high level machine overview from notes template`
  `./graphquery --human <(zet/20221014025416/tagboundary $highlevel notes)`


```mermaid
graph TD;
  20221011181453 --> 20221011183500
  20221011181453 --> 20221011181531
  20221011181453 --> 20221011184954
  20221011181453 --> 20221011181347
  20221011181531 --> 20221003151194
  20221011181531 --> 20221011184954
  20221011181531 --> 20221011183500
  20221011181531 --> 20221011182350
  20221011181531 --> 20221011182140
  20221011181531 --> 20221011181920
  20221011181531 --> 20221011181347
  20221011181531 --> 20221011181453
  20221011182140 --> 20221011181531
  20221011182140 --> 20221011181920
  20221011182140 --> 20221011182350
  20221011182140 --> 20221011182254
  20221011182140 --> 20221011182016
  20221011182140 --> 20221011181820
  20221011182140 --> 20221011181347
```

` zet/20221030041924/README.md `
